videos.description: Mamadi Diakite sends a shot into the stands as Virginia holds Pitt to only 7 first-half points.
videos.headline: Virginia's Diakite denies Pitt

videos.description: Mamadi Diakite sends another shot attempt flying in the second half.
videos.headline: Diakite continues to dominate for Virginia

videos.description: De'Andre Hunter joins the broadcast after putting up a 14-point performance with his family in attendance for the first time all season.
videos.headline: Hunter puts on a show for family
